wordGroup: approximately equal 约等于，近似等于

sentences.en: The journey took approximately seven hours.
sentences.cn: 旅程大约花了七个小时。

sentences.en: The flight takes approximately three hours.
sentences.cn: 飞行时间大约需要三小时。

sentences.en: At approximately 11:30 p.m., Pollard finally gave his consent to the search.
sentences.cn: 大约晚上11:30的时候，波拉德终于对搜查予以同意。
